description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity protection from physical or environmental threats (i.e. fires or blizzards).
name: HITRUST CSF - Physical AND Environmental Protection

values.description: Security perimeters are defined and used to protect areas that contain either sensitive or critical information and information processing facilities.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.a Physical Security Perimeter
